name: Alley Elementor Widget
author: alleythemes

sections.description:
Alley Elementor Widget made to display the content for Testimonials, Services and Promotions from Alley Business Toolkits.

Free Widgets:
-Pricing Table
sections.installation:
Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Go to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select alley-elementor-widget.zip from your computer.
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
